messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] American Idol
messages.msgSnippet: ... Don t feel bad, we ve been watching American Idol since the first episode! Well! Survivor wasn t on so we needed *something* to help us through this
messages.messageBody:
> Ok, I made myself make the rules. We're new at this "un" stuff, I'm still
> trying to get over my fear of letting them do whatever they want! You're
> right about the worst stuff being on at night ( and I hate to say I got
> addicted to American Idol), I guess the point is to get them out of the
> house and into the world, doing "stuff", playing etc. etc.
> Jenny


Don't feel bad, we've been watching American Idol since the first episode!
Well! Survivor wasn't on so we needed *something* to help us through this
summer. ;-)
BTW, we all picked Kelly Clarkson to win and we were all glad she did.
There's worse things to watch on TV than a singing competition - I thought
the show was okay.

Karin
